name: test_NAF_9_9_0_Popular_Nutrition_One_Tag_Selected
description:
Verify user can only choose one tag

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Verify Popular or Nutrition tag is not selected by default
6. Toggle Popular or Nutrition tag
7. Verify tag is selected
8. Toggle Popular or Nutrition tag
9. Verify tag is not selected
6. Verify program is successfully deleted

statusMessage:
playwright._impl._errors.Error: It looks like you are using Playwright Sync API inside the asyncio loop.
Please use the Async API instead.
